text: Professional sales and service team. They will not hard sell and provide very insightful feedback. Another vendor told me to replace a new unit but they managed to find out the issue and the refrigerator is back to working condition with minimal fixing costs. thank you!

Martin has been very patient and helpful.  He uploaded various photos for comparisons and gave us detailed information on the specs of the chillers and freezers.  He was very accommodating with our delivery request.
Martin was very polite and responsive, answering all my enquiries well into the night. He also managed to get my chiller delivered on the same day!
Bought a glass door fridge from them. Delivery is good and fuss free. Fridge looks good, thanks for the service!
